name: team-1-time-reporting-system
description: A time-tracking platform with User and Admin interfaces.

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend_user" "npm run dev -w frontend_admin"
scripts.dev:user: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend_user"
scripts.dev:admin: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend_admin"
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend_user && npm run build -w frontend_admin
scripts.test:frontend: npm run test -w frontend_admin && npm run test -w frontend_user
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:unit: npm run test -w backend -- src && npm run test -w frontend_admin && npm run test -w frontend_user
